metadata.name: Nymphéas 1907 Original #1
metadata.description: Nymphéas, 1907, an exquisite oil on canvas by Claude Monet (1840-1926), the master of Impressionism, continues to inspire the world with his iconic Nymphéas series. Capturing the enchanting beauty of morning and afternoon scenes with open lily blossoms, this acclaimed series drew comparisons to Cubist experiments in 1909. Recently sold for $56,495,000 in May 2022, this signed and dated masterpiece showcases Monet's enduring artistic legacy. This is the first ever officially licensed Claude Monet NFT as a premium digital artwork in 3D by ElmonX. Holders can view and interact with the NFT in Augmented Reality. Edition: 1 of 530
